revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road |image = [[File:Victory Road.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Victory Road. |tokens = 2,000 |location = On Route 23. }} '''Victory Road''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. == Random Encounters == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !!
